attributes.action: adopt the slogan 'As My Whimsy Takes Me' as the national motto for the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'As My Whimsy Takes Me' is the motto of the fictional family of the Dukes of Denver, created by Dorothy L. Sayers.  As such, this motto celebrates the great tradition of English detective fiction, as well as the national qualities of insouciance and brilliance.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
